QA Glossary - Letter W

This is just Letter W

WiFi throttling

  • intentional slowing an internet service speed that was provided by ISP.

Wakelock

  • is a mechanism to indicate that your application needs to have the device stay on.
  • an application takes CPU time for a particular time and then releases partial wakelock, full wakelock,
  • Becomes an issue when an application takes a wakelock but doesnâ€™t release it - instead keeps consuming a lot of battery => causing power regression=> logs capture it
